### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** M7 Chiller and Heat Pump Replacement
**Tender Reference:** PW-22-01006566
**Solicitation Number:** 22-58045
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-11 14:00:00

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the replacement of chillers and heat pumps in Building M07 at the Montreal Road Campus. This project is categorized under Construction of Other Buildings (Gsin: 5129B).

**Project Overview:**

The scope of work includes the replacement of chillers and heat pumps in Building M07, located on the Montreal Road Campus of the National Research Council of Canada. The successful bidder will be required to demonstrate a minimum of 10 years of experience in executing mechanical projects and providing construction services comparable to this tender.

**Eligibility Criteria:**

To be considered eligible, bidders must demonstrate the mandatory requirements:

1. Have a minimum of 10 years of experience in executing mechanical projects and providing construction services comparable to this tender.
2. Supply a CV for the proposed Construction Site Supervisor and Project Manager.
3. Demonstrate membership in MCAC or any recognized mechanical contractors association in Ontario.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The evaluation will be based on a combination of technical score and price rating. The technical score will account for 40% of the total score, while the price score will account for 60%. The bidder with the highest combined score will be selected as the successful bidder.

**Proposal Requirements:**

The proposal must be submitted in two separate attachments: Technical Proposal and Tender Form. The Technical Proposal must not include any financial information, while the Tender Form must contain all financial information. The proposal must not exceed 30 pages, excluding certain exceptions.

**Security Requirement:**

The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). All personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS granted or approved by CISD/PWGSC.

**Important Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-11 14:00:00
* Mandatory Site Visit: September 20th and 21st, 2022 at 9:00
* Contract Signing Date: To be determined

**Contact Information:**
